title: Worlds Tokens Being Unavailable
body: As of an hour and a half ago I was brought to the sudden realisation that I couldn't earn anymore worlds tokens. I honestly feel like it was neglected to be mentioned when exactly this lockout was to occur. I'm pretty much an ADC main and have been working super hard to get the prestige KDA Kai'Sa skin since it was revealed, only to fall exactly 84 tokens short. If there is anything I could do to get some more time to earn such tokens, or even just buy the remainder upfront, I would like to know. I'm honestly heartbroken after my rough month of hard-work for it to end in nought. If someone could get back to me on this as to what to do it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
So the tokens were always slated to end on [November 20, 2018 at 18:59 p.m. AEDT](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-worlds-season-2018-event). In saying that however, that information wasn't as well publicised as it could have been.

Unfortunately the best suggestion I have to offer is to submit a ticket to player support and hope that they can/will help you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They have no obligation to, but they may be able to work something out.
Yeah, a friend gave me the same response. I've done that already! Thank you for your help.
